    org.simplity.proto

    as a client, this is all you need to know as to how to ask the server for a service and get response.

  • Classes in org.simplity.kernel.value used by org.simplity.kernel.value 
    Class and Description
    BlobValue
    represents a BLOB as defined in an RDBMS.
    BooleanValue
    represents a boolean value that can either be true or false
    ClobValue
    represents a CLOB as defined in an RDBMS.
    DateValue
    represents a date value.
    DecimalValue
    a numeric value with possible fraction
    IntegerValue
    represents whole number
    InvalidValueException
    Represents an exceptional condition that an invalid value is being used to create Value object
    TextValue
    represents a value that has string/text value
    TimestampValue
    Very special value, and should not be used except for specific timestap field defined in an rdbms.
    Value
    Represents value of a field or data element.
    ValueType
    basic type of values used to represent data values in application.
